ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

ElementDescription: Sex of subject at birth
Notes: M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: Form used/assessment name
Notes: e.g., Self-Report, Parent Form, Short Form, Revised Version

ElementDescription: Timepoint/visit label
Notes: e.g., Baseline, Morning, At Bedtime

ElementDescription: Miscellaneous comments on study, interview, methodology relevant to this form data
I act too young for my age / Acts too young for his/her age.
Notes: 0 = Not True; 1 = Somewhat True; 2 = Very True; 777 = Refuse to answer; 999 = Don't know

ElementDescription: I argue a lot / Argues a lot.
Notes: 0 = Not True; 1 = Somewhat True; 2 = Very True; 777 = Refuse to answer; 999 = Don't know

ElementDescription: I fail to finish things I start / Fails to finish things he/she starts.
Notes: 0 = Not True; 1 = Somewhat True; 2 = Very True; 777 = Refuse to answer; 999 = Don't know

ElementDescription: I have trouble concentrating or paying attention / Can't concentrate, can't pay attention for long.
Notes: 0 = Not True; 1 = Somewhat True; 2 = Very True; 777 = Refuse to answer; 999 = Don't know

ElementDescription: I have trouble sitting still / Can't sit still, restless, or hyperactive.
Notes: 0 = Not True; 1 = Somewhat True; 2 = Very True; 777 = Refuse to answer; 999 = Don't know

ElementDescription: I destroy things belonging to others / Destroys things belonging to family or others
Notes: 0 = Not True; 1 = Somewhat True; 2 = Very True; 777 = Refuse to answer; 999 = Don't know

ElementDescription: I disobey my parents / Disobedient at home
Notes: 0 = Not True; 1 = Somewhat True; 2 = Very True; 777 = Refuse to answer; 999 = Don't know

ElementDescription: I disobey at school. (Interviewer: Please select "Not True" when participant is not in school at the time of the assessment.) / Disobedient at school
Notes: 0 = Not True; 1 = Somewhat True; 2 = Very True; 777 = Refuse to answer; 999 = Don't know

ElementDescription: I feel worthless or inferior  Definition of inferior: less good / Feels worthless or inferior
Notes: 0 = Not True; 1 = Somewhat True; 2 = Very True; 777 = Refuse to answer; 999 = Don't know

ElementDescription: I act without stopping to think / Impulsive or acts without thinking
Notes: 0 = Not True; 1 = Somewhat True; 2 = Very True; 777 = Refuse to answer; 999 = Don't know

ElementDescription: I am too fearful or anxious / Too fearful or anxious
Notes: 0 = Not True; 1 = Somewhat True; 2 = Very True; 777 = Refuse to answer; 999 = Don't know

ElementDescription: I feel too guilty / Feels too guilty
Notes: 0 = Not True; 1 = Somewhat True; 2 = Very True; 777 = Refuse to answer; 999 = Don't know

ElementDescription: I am self-conscious or easily embarrassed / Self-conscious or easily embarrassed
Notes: 0 = Not True; 1 = Somewhat True; 2 = Very True; 777 = Refuse to answer; 999 = Don't know

ElementDescription: I am inattentive or easily distracted / Inattentive or easily distracted
Notes: 0 = Not True; 1 = Somewhat True; 2 = Very True; 777 = Refuse to answer; 999 = Don't know

ElementDescription: I am stubborn / Stubborn, sullen, or irritable
Notes: 0 = Not True; 1 = Somewhat True; 2 = Very True; 777 = Refuse to answer; 999 = Don't know

ElementDescription: I have a hot temper  Definition of "hot temper": bad temper, get mad easily / Temper tantrums or hot temper
Notes: 0 = Not True; 1 = Somewhat True; 2 = Very True; 777 = Refuse to answer; 999 = Don't know

ElementDescription: I threaten to hurt people / Threatens people
Notes: 0 = Not True; 1 = Somewhat True; 2 = Very True; 777 = Refuse to answer; 999 = Don't know

ElementDescription: I am unhappy, sad, or depressed / Unhappy, sad, or depressed
Notes: 0 = Not True; 1 = Somewhat True; 2 = Very True; 777 = Refuse to answer; 999 = Don't know

ElementDescription: I worry a lot / Worries
Notes: 0 = Not True; 1 = Somewhat True; 2 = Very True; 777 = Refuse to answer; 999 = Don't know
